# ONLYOFFICE - Secure Online Office | ONLYOFFICE

ONLYOFFICE offers a secure online office suite highly compatible with MS Office formats. Connect it to your web platform for document editing and collaboration or use as a part of ONLYOFFICE DocSpace.

## Getting Started
- [Get it now](https://www.onlyoffice.com/): Access the ONLYOFFICE suite and start using its features.

## Product Releases
- [ONLYOFFICE Docs 9.0 released: flawless interface, Diagram Viewer, support for .md files, AI-powered sheets & macros, and more](https://www.onlyoffice.com/blog/2025/06/onlyoffice-docs-9-0-released): An overview of the new features and improvements in ONLYOFFICE Docs 9.0.

## Language Support
- [enEnglish](https://www.onlyoffice.com/en/): English language support.
- [frfrançais](https://www.onlyoffice.com/fr/): French language support.
- [deDeutsch](https://www.onlyoffice.com/de/): German language support.
- [esespañol](https://www.onlyoffice.com/es/): Spanish language support.
- [ptportuguês](https://www.onlyoffice.com/pt/): Portuguese language support.
- [ititaliano](https://www.onlyoffice.com/it/): Italian language support.
- [csčeština](https://www.onlyoffice.com/cs/): Czech language support.
- [nlNederlands](https://www.onlyoffice.com/nl/): Dutch language support.
- [ja日本語](https://www.onlyoffice.com/ja/): Japanese language support.
- [zh中文](https://www.onlyoffice.com/zh/): Chinese language support.
- [ruрусский](https://www.onlyoffice.com/ru/): Russian language support.
- [srsrpski](https://www.onlyoffice.com/sr/): Serbian language support.

- [Meeting rooms](https://www.onlyoffice.com/office-for-zoom.aspx): Overview of meeting room capabilities.
- [Public rooms](https://www.onlyoffice.com/public-rooms.aspx): Information on public room features.
- [Custom rooms](https://www.onlyoffice.com/custom-rooms.aspx): Details on creating custom rooms for specific needs.
- [Form Filling rooms](https://www.onlyoffice.com/form-filling-rooms.aspx): Explanation of form filling rooms for data collection.
- [Virtual data rooms](https://www.onlyoffice.com/virtual-data-rooms.aspx): Overview of virtual data rooms for secure document sharing.
- [DocSpace connectors](https://www.onlyoffice.com/all-connectors.aspx): Information on connectors available for DocSpace integration.

## Customer Success Stories
- [How Kinderhaus Berlin shares and collaborates on sensitive files with ONLYOFFICE DocSpace](https://www.onlyoffice.com/blog/2023/11/how-kinderhaus-berlin-is-using-onlyoffice-docspace): A case study on Kinderhaus Berlin's use of ONLYOFFICE.
- [Why the Guará Linux team chooses ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors as the default office suite for 22.000 employees of the Military Police of Minas Gerais](https://www.onlyoffice.com/blog/2024/07/onlyoffice-desktop-editors-on-guara-linux): Insights into the Guará Linux team's decision.
- [How Czech TV replaced Google Docs and MS Office with ONLYOFFICE and ownCloud](https://www.onlyoffice.com/blog/2021/04/how-czech-tv-replaced-google-docs-and-ms-office-with-onlyoffice-and-owncloud/): A case study on Czech TV's transition to ONLYOFFICE.
- [How SWITCH integrated ONLYOFFICE into SWITCHdrive to create a complete alternative to Office 365](https://www.onlyoffice.com/blog/2021/02/how-switch-integrated-onlyoffice-into-switchdrive-to-create-a-complete-alternative-to-office-365/): Overview of SWITCH's integration of ONLYOFFICE.
- [The City of Hopewell, Virginia: enabling remote work for 500 government employees with ONLYOFFICE](https://www.onlyoffice.com/blog/2020/06/onlyoffice-in-the-city-of-hopewell/): A case study on the City of Hopewell's implementation.
- [How Calar Alto Observatory implements ONLYOFFICE for secure & location-independent collaboration](https://www.onlyoffice.com/blog/2022/06/how-calar-alto-observatory-implements-onlyoffice/): Insights into Calar Alto Observatory's use of ONLYOFFICE.

This structured summary provides a comprehensive overview of ONLYOFFICE's offerings, features, and resources, ensuring clarity and accessibility for users seeking information about the platform.
